---
title: "Cell cycle assignment"
params:
    organism: "mouse"
---

Load Bioconductor package(s):

```{r}
library(scran)
```

Load CRAN package(s):

```{r}

```

Read experiment object(s):

```{r}
sce <- readRDS("object.rds")
```



```{r}
con <- system.file("exdata", paste0(params$organism, "_cycle_markers.rds"), package = "scran")

dat <- readRDS(con)
```

Cell cycle phase classification:

```{r}
out <- bplapply(X = sce, FUN = cyclone, pairs = dat)
```

Set phase label:

```{r}
for (i in names(sce)) { sce[[i]]$Phase <- out[[i]]$phases }
```

Save experiment object(s):

```{r}
saveRDS(sce, file = "cell-cycle.rds")
```

Print session information:

```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
